sentences.en: For uncounted millions, faith remains as rock - solid as Gibraltar.
sentences.cn: 对无数的信徒来讲, 信仰就像直布罗陀的岩石一样坚不可摧.

sentences.en: Many more trekked up, uncounted, from Mexico.
sentences.cn: 还有大量不记其数的墨西哥人跋涉而来.

sentences.en: More than 3 m people are thought to have gone uncounted in the 2000 census.
sentences.cn: 有人认为超过300万的人在2000年的人口普查当中漏报.

sentences.en: This arrangement is no different from one where the voter casts a symbolic vote, a vote that remains uncounted, with the outcome already determined by the whims of the tyrant.
sentences.cn: 民主制度的这种安排与独裁者的独断专行基本无异，选民只是象征性的投了一票，但是这一票背后的民意却很少有人关心。

sentences.en: This has condensed our and painstaking effort of uncounted MINDONG colleagues among them.
sentences.cn: 这其中凝聚了我和无数闽东同仁的心血.

sentences.en: Uncounted millions leaped they before me.
sentences.cn: 在我之前无数的百万他们跳跃.

sentences.en: Uncounted thousands died in Rome and other cities across the empire.
sentences.cn: 数不尽成千病患死于罗马及帝国其他各城市.
